verses.roman:
tumiha kariha bhakti-śāstrera pracāra
mathurāya lupta-tīrthera kariha uddhāra

synonyms: tumiha—you also; kariha—should perform; bhakti-śāstrera pracāra—propagation of the revealed scriptures of devotional service; mathurāya—in Mathurā; lupta-tīrthera—of lost places of pilgrimage; kariha—should make; uddhāra—recovery.
translation: "O Sanātana, you should broadcast the revealed scriptures on devotional service and excavate the lost places of pilgrimage in the district of Mathurā.
